Text.Name: God_Gong_2
Text.Desc: A Law of Shendao cultivation method that had been lost since ancient times, it is a way of gathering the Belief of living beings in order to achieve divinity. Most schools of Law of Shendao share a lot of similarities, they only differ in the kind of spiritual catalyst being used, which summon different celestial beings for protection. The heritage of Eight Heavens Sadhana came from the heaven beyond heavens to the west. By cultivating this method, one would be able to harness the spiritual catalyst of many heavens to summon the Eight Legion spirits as guardians. It emphasizes spellcraft.
Text.SelectDesc: Faith Cultivation is different from the more traditional way of utilizing Golden Core. It entirely relies on the faith of the living beings. Although there is no requirement of talent for Faith Cultivation, your still need to have a very high level of Intelligence if you ever want to reach the top. Do you wish to choose to cultivate this Law?
